name: Weekdays at Ronny's
description:
I didn't see the "draft" button so this is coming in a solid 9 days late. Great work. Flawless.

Only available on Mac as I didn't realize until 20 minutes ago I cannot export to Windows from my mac. At least not while still getting to the deadline. 

For the My First Game Jam of the Summer of 2022. I knew nothing about programming going into this and decided that Unreal Engine was the way to go.
My teammate did the art assets while I "handled" the coding side of it. For a first go, this is just about what I expected but somehow still less than what I thought capable for two weeks worth of effort. Still, it's not perfect but it's still "done" :) Definitely planning on doing more jams in the future.
